items.value: Ci conosciamo? / Do we know us?

Mi chiamo Capone!,
oh ... you don't speak italian?
No problem, I also speak English!

Who are you? I've never seen you here before!
I'm the Dealer Boss of this Gang. Would you like to work for me? If yes, get sure you have at least one free Slot within your Inventory!
I'm new to the gang, tell me more ...
Of course, I love dirty Jobs!

Welcome in the Family,
with us everything is different than up there.

If you want to survive here you have to help your Gang Members and make sure they are always well kept.

In the beginning you can help get Drugs, in time I will teach you how to make different Substances! After that you can also do other Business.
sounds good, where did we stop?
Err.. i will come back later!

Excellent!

Your first order is already waiting for you.
Please visit Romana at the small Town by the Sea.
She ordered a package of fun from us!

When you have delivered the package, come back to me! I took € 100 from you, Romana will pay you € 200 and € 100 are for you!

Stop!

I can't just give you the package.
Come back when you have a deposit of € 100.

You will get the money back after completing the order!
